response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and utility, I am offering it to you at a special price considering your needs. I kindly propose a purchase price of $10,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a significant discount compared to its market value while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its worth. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 10000}
